text: The French Hospital Federation (Fédération hospitalière de France) is a non- profit association started in 1924. Almost all the public sector health and social care institutions, about 2000, are members. This includes about 1000 hospitals and about 1000 retirement homes and independent specialized shelters. It promotes these organisations, represents them, and supports them. It has representatives at many official bodies. ==References== Category:Hospitals in France Category:Non-profit organizations of France Category:Organizations based in Paris
title: French Hospital Federation
